pullrequest.title: Change cmake project name to sdformat8, export cmake targets

content.raw:
One thing to note is that `SDFormat_LIBRARIES` still just refers to the library file paths. This is in contrast to the ignition `_LIBRARIES` variables, e.g. `IGNITION-MATH_LIBRARIES` which refer to the imported target. You need to explicitly refer to `sdformat8::sdformat8` to link to the imported target.

I wouldn't be opposed to changing the old `SDFormat_LIBRARIES` variable to match the ignition libraries or introducing a `sdformat8_LIBRARIES` variable that refers to the imported target. But I refrained from doing that in order to minimize the changes to SDFormat's behavior; I feel like it makes more sense to leave big changes until we roll out `ign-sdformat`.
